dt: {bc}a fixture for drawing or regulating the flow of liquid especially from a pipe

et: Middle English, bung, faucet, from Middle French {it}fausset{/it} bung, perhaps from {it}fausser{/it} to damage, from Late Latin {it}falsare{/it} to falsify, from Latin {it}falsus{/it} false
shortdef: a fixture for drawing or regulating the flow of liquid especially from a pipe
